import { decodeLog, decodeParameter, decodeParameters, encodeEventSignature, encodeFunctionCall, encodeFunctionSignature, encodeParameter, encodeParameters } from 'web3-eth-abi';
/**
 * The object for `web3.abi`
 */
export default {
  encodeEventSignature,
  encodeFunctionCall,
  encodeFunctionSignature,
  encodeParameter,
  encodeParameters,
  decodeParameter,
  decodeParameters,
  decodeLog
};
